Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class SelectModeController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.SelectModeController
public class SelectModeController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the SelectMode page of the game On this page the user must choose the game mode between SoloMode and MultiplayerMode

  • Field Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void handleMultiPlayButton()
    method used to manage the user's choice to MultiMode It is performed when the MultiPlayerMode button is pressed
    (package private) void handleSoloPlayButton()
    method used to manage the user's choice to SoloMode It is performed when the SoloMode button is pressed
    void initialize()
    Main method that initializes the scene within the stage It takes care of setting the background of the scene and the font of the texts and buttons
